file.name: invalid_schema_types.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.1

# this example shows invalid types for the schemaObject

info:
  title: API
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  schemas:
    invalid_null: null
    invalid_number: 0
    invalid_array: []

Error: json: cannot unmarshal array into Go struct field Components.components.schemas of type ogen.Schema
